title: Air Quality in Mumbai During COVID-19
text:
Last updated: 2020-May-24

Here, we are visualizing air quality in Mumbai during the three lockdown periods. A press article covering this data was published in the Hindustan Times (2020/May/24).

Lockdown Phase 1: March 24th to April 14th, 2020.

Lockdown Phase 2: April 15th to May 3rd, 2020.

Lockdown Phase 3: May 4th to May 17th, 2020.

O3 and CO averages are for day-time only.

PM10, PM2.5, SO2, and NO2 averages are all-time.
